content.rendered:
One of Luxe Concept Salon’s stand out talents, Andrew gives every client a down to earth, personal touch with his love of colour and strong cutting skills.

Andrew has honed his skills achieving Master Colour Technician status with De Lorenzo and has worked with some of the top names in the industry, fine tuning his already impressive hairdressing.

“Consultation is key to achieving my client’s needs” and it is this attitude that makes Andrew one of our most in demand stylists.

Availability: Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday & Every 2nd weekend.

excerpt.rendered: Andrew gives every client a down to earth, personal touch with his love of colour and strong cutting skills.
